values:
... but life for me has been alright. I haven't really done that much lately, just played pool and worked out. I have started a reputation at some of the halls I go to. Probably because I've won two tournaments, of which I'm sure you guys don't care either. Anyway, I don't know if this applies to anyone, but I will be in Virginia for about a month, starting Friday. So if anyone is in that area for whatever reason, give me a call. Other then that, I will talk to you guys when I come back around New Years.

Rich
well ill be home from the 30th until the 4th of july, if anyone wants to chill, let me know

Well it has been a while since I last updated this journal of mine. Today I returned from being out to sea for 5 days. I believe my ship I just destined to be underway for all major holidays of the year. I imagine I will receive some sort of derogative comment from some people by writing this post, just because that's how it normally is. Anyway, I hope everyone had a nice memorial day. Other then that, if anyone who would like to get in contact with me, and doesn't havc my new cell phone number, it is 1(603)233-8974.

Rich

ok well i am back in cuba once again, god this deployment has sucked the second half. should be back home in a week, unless they extend us more, which knowing this damn ship, i wouldnt doubt it. anyway, i will be back in nashua from the 20th of april to the 2nd of may. so if anyone wants to hang out or what not just let me know. i just need to get away from the military for a little bit, i mean i found gray hairs, gah!!!! im only 19 im not supposed to have gray hair..........

~the pornstar~

well just got back from the south american continent. holy shit, it is crazy down there, prostitutes everywhere! its so awesome. i have so many stories about shit that went down and all of the booze and hot women, and parties and clubs and ... damn the list goes on. sorry the sentence structure wasnt the greatest but you get the point. now i come back look online to see what everyone has been doingwith themselves, and like usual its the same old bullshit just a different day. well if your one of the lucky few you might be hearing from me in the next couple of days. PEACE OUT!!!!

The Dickster

thats approximately how long it will be until i leave for 6 months. where am i going you may ask. well the answer to that is south america, yeah baby! i cant fucking wait, im gonna get so blasted! lol. oh yeah if any of you peeps wanna keep in touch with me and hear about my travels, my email is rhainsworth@halyburton.navy.mil i hope to hear from you bastards, and if i dont oh well thats your loss. oh yeah one other if you hear from me on new years eve its cause im in montego bay, jamaica! woooooooooooo. Peace out peeps! Reeshad

well i would like to say that i no longer have a girlfriend. i just love how chicks, do cool things like that and break up with you. its always fun right. so in order to deal with it i am listening to old school "Kool and the Gang" lol.
I would also like to add that i had fun up in NH while i was there, although most of you dont care, but its ok. anyways i leave in 3 weeks, so i will talk to you all later. 
Reeshad
in a sudden turn of events i am no longer single. puerto rican chicks are awesome.

just so all of you know, cause i know most of you care... my new email on the ship here is rhainsworth@halyburton.navy.mil fell free to email me, because it gets rather boring out here, especially when instant messanger only works some of the time.

so it turns out that im going to alabama for july 4th, i dont know why, but thats where my ships going i feel so lucky....... um yeah... anyways, turns out that florida sucks when you dont have a vehicle of some sort. just kinda waiting til i go on my 6 month deployment to south america and the carribean. oh boy, cant wait for that! afterwards i should have a nice chunk of cash in the bank, so then ill get my ride. haha, anyways peeps, im out for now, talk to ya all later.
Richard

hey whats up peeps, just chillin down here, in sunny florida. havent heard too much stuff lately about nashua, but thats cool, cause not much happens there. the past two days its been raining, but other then that its been hot and sunny. pretty nice just wish i had a car. well my ship pulls in tomorrow, and i will be going on there, so im not sure when the next time is that i will get to use a computer. so if i dont get back to you for a while thats prolly why. hey happens right. on another note;
these computers here, for some odd reason AIM doesnt work, so if you wanna contact me other then phone or email, you gotta use yahoo instant messanger. kinda odd cause you would figure that the navy would have top of the line computers, but no.. thats not how it works here. so if you get a yahoo name, just email it to me and ill add you to my list. by the way my messanger name is hainsworthr, really original huh? im out, peace peeps, Reeshad

well finally after being here for just a little over 2 weeks its time for me to say goodbye to you all once again. unfortunately i have to go back to the real world and work for a living. i only wish that i could have stayed longer. regardless, thats how life is sometimes, it doesnt always go the way you want it too, but you have to make the best out of it.

i mean if you dont youll always regret what you never did do in the past. finally, i leave you all with this, when i come back next time, only a certain few will know so it can be a bigger suprise.
salutations and farewell, ~Richard

Well I finally got a confirmation on where I am being assigned to for my orders. Turns out that I'm going to be in

Florida

for the next 4 years. Should be pretty sweet. Then there is always going on cruise in the carribean to stop drug boats and shit like that, I can't wait. For all those who don't know, although its old news, I am coming back to Nashua on the 7th of May. Well anyways, I'm out for now so see you all then. Reeshad

well over the past week i have realized that there really are some scum bags in this world. stupid assholes at fucking jewelry stores trying to get you to buy things that are way over priced. just aggrivating to think that people thrive off military pay and arent in the military. on another note, i get a 10% discount at any dennys and IHOP nation wide, so that is a plus, amen to that.

Hey Dude! Start your horse and come along, you're
one happenin' dude. Don't get lost out on the
range.

well today i had a lot of fun, although the beginning of it sucked. had to get up at 5:00 am cause I had a duty section muster, then at 5:45 i had to do a security watch, not too fun if you ask me. but after i got off, i went up to my buddy lenny's room to get him, so we could go boarding. the drive took 2 hours to get there, cause all of the mountains near here are closed down for the season. but overall i had a good time. now til next season.

Well the last two days have sucked, been stuck at class because people fuck up from different classes, so we all got screwed over. on a good note though, i get paid in about 6 minutes, so i think i may just run out to the ATM so i can look at the extra $450 thats in there, lol.

This is most likely going to get some remarks that are degrading but oh well, my message is for the better. I was unable to post in her journal, so I figured I would try and help out her situation, considering that last time I checked, I was friends with her or atleast a good aquantance. Now I dont know exactly what is bringing you to a lowered self emotional state, but I believe I can relate in some ways.
Now, me personally, I went through some of the most depressing times of my life in the past 2 months. Boot camp was not an easy thing for me. I believe it or not actually cryed. Why, because I thought that I was gonna be held back, and not be able to see my family after the scheduled 2 months. This is because I thought that I was going to get put back in training. Not being able to see any of your friends or family for 2 months straight is hard, as I am sure you can imagine. The main reason for this is because if you get in too much trouble, or just fall behind in the things you need to do, you get sent back a few weeks. I actually met a guy who had been in there for 6 months, just because he had injured himself.
Anyways, sure I am rambling on, but I wouldnt be able to get my crappy story across if I didn't. Basically what I am trying to say is that you gotta talk to people, let um know how you feel, and if they are your friends then they should listen, no matter how rediculous the circumstance. If need be you can talk to me.
Now I got that out of the way, I will be awaiting the storm of comments that come along with posts like this, most likely some will be from RCT. lol

1. My name:

2. Where did we meet?

3. Take a stab at my middle name:

4. How long have you known me?

5. How well do you know me?

6. Do I believe in God?

7. When you first saw me what was your 1st impression?

8. My age?

9. Birthday?

10. Color hair?

11. Color eyes?

12. Do I have any siblings?

13. How many?

14. What's one of my favorite things to do?

15. Do you remember one of the 1st things I said to you?

16. What's my favorite type of music?

17. What is the best feature about me?

18. Am I shy or outgoing?

19. Would you say I am funny?

20. Am I a rebel or do I follow all the rules?

21. Would you consider me a friend?

22. Would you call me preppy, average, sporty, punk, hippie, nerdy, snobby, or something else?

23. Have you ever seen me cry?

24. If there were one good nickname for me what would it be?

25. Are my parents still together?

26. What do I love?

27. What songs make you think of me?

28. If you could set me up with one person for the rest of my life, who would it be?

Well today pretty much sucked, had to wake up at 6:30 AM to go to school and finish some top secret clearance shit, wasnt too fun. Got my ass chewed when I got there by the Chief cause it wasnt done. Then on top of that the asshole who runs the whole program wouldn't do fingerprints for me cause I had only turned in my info today, son of a bitch.

After that though, I went back to the barracks got dressed and shit, and went to get some burgers for lunch. Met a guy that I knew from bootcamp there, then he found out he was late for class and had to jet. After that went back home and chilled until now.

On a seperate note, I watched Cruel Intentions in my spare time today, and damn Sarah Michelle Gellar is fucking hott. Now I am hungry time for pizza.

Peace out peeps.

Just got off class, would have been out like 2 hours ago but shit had be finished so I was stuck there for the extra time. Right now I am debating on whether or not I should go to a party in 2 weeks. Most parties that navy peeps throw get busted by the cops, means big trouble for them. So I mean go party, have fun, get drunk, all that good stuff. But still run a huge risk of getting arrested and lots of bad stuff, especially since Im under military law aswell. Well anyways, I finish my schooling here in Illinois the 7th of May. So I should be back in Nashua the 8th or so. Either way theres gonna be some parties, atleast there better be.

Well I just got out of class, about 10 minutes ago. Again it finished about 2 hours early. I enjoy the fact that in a matter of 3 days I have had to learn almost more then half of a 1400 page computer book. Its great, I'm learning what it takes civilians normally to learn in 4 years about computer science, all in a matter of 14 weeks.

I found out today that Rory Skaggs is only about a half hour away from me so Im gonna call him tommorrow and see if he wants to hang out sometime.

Anyways gotta jet cause I have security watch tomorrow. Peace out!
today i graduated from basic training!

Tomorrow is the big day, I leave the whole nashua scene and move on in my life. Its great cause im gonna get to travel the world and lots of cool stuff like that but the main thing that sucks about it, is that i dont get so see all you guys and gals. When the 2 months are up ill give everyone a call. So ill ttyl peeps.

Earlier today I went to the buffet cause the kiddies didnt have school. Then I got a new case for my pool cue, and right after that I bought some lottery tickets.Later on after I ate dinner, I "rocked the vote". Then at about 7:30 good ol' Kevin Kearns called me up and he was like we going to that strip club tonight, so of course I was all over it. Although there was a lot of T and A, it wasn't all that great. Cause its all eye candy! After that we played some pool at Leda, then went to Wendys and finished the night off with a trip around Walmart. Being 18 is awesome! :)
My mission has not succeeded yet.
tommorrow is exactly 2 weeks before i leave for the navy. that also means that it is a week til my 18th birthday.
Dude its not cool to actually do something that you enjoy doing, I mean jeeze who does that. Its kinda like eating food when your fat. Or playing basketball when your a basketball player.

Last night I,
  1. Went to play ulimate frisbee and it was a no show
  2. Got my ass kicked at the Teen Extreme Games
  3. Went to Burger World with Tyzone, Kyle, Matty J, and Fat
  4. And finally, played some parking lot soccer at Market Basket, so much fun.

Hopefully another game is gonna go down tonight

over the past 3 nights i have gotten drunk at pubs round town everynight so far, its been great, ive even drank in a pub that ozzy osbourne has sat and drank in. thats goitta be one of hte best things about being over here at the moment, besides the whole football, and family thing. well anyways, ill be back in the states on sunday, so see yall then if ya dont hear from me before hand.

Im in England and Budd is fat, its good to here that the old crew is back again, I know that this will probably get some comments cause I'm dissing on someone but oh well, hey if anyone wants anything while I'm over here reply or just email me, reeshadthebeast@aol.com, peace out peeps!!!
Today at the end of the day, if anyone sees a limo in the student pick up, thats for me, haha. peace out!

When going to prom i figured hey, tonight is gonna be pretty fun, then i chilled for a bit and talked to people. Then i couldnt find my date, cause she "ditched" me. then when she decided to dance with me after 4 hours of not being anywhere around. i just left in my limo and cruised around manchester, that was prolly the most exciting part of the entire night.
Oh yeah I might be getting picked up from school in a limo tomorrow, still gotta make a few calls, but if i am, it'll be great. one thing that could possibly make my weekend a bit better.

If anyone has quake 3 arena that i can borrow, please let me know, ive been dying to play the bid for power mod!
Just so everyone knows, even though most of you dont care, I am leaving for England June 15th, and returning July 6th.
Well as I am sure all of you know that I was pulled over, got the ticket, and so on. Well I found out from my friend Tim that I was in the paper on Sunday cause of my hearing the otehr week.

Its my 4th day in england now, not too much has happened thats of total interest. Tommorrow, Im going to visit my aunt a bit up north, and then come back to my uncles house to eventually go down the pub and play some pool, last night i had battered sausage and chips for "tea". tuesday im going  to pizza hut, for some british pizza. wednesday and thursday dont really have any plans that i know of. friday staying at my grandparents house with my cousins while my parents go to wales for the day. saturday, im gonna be going to the pub in rothley for a karyoke(or however you spell it). then unfortunately on saunday i fly back.

Tonight after my indoor soccer game, I decided to race my freind Justin Jaskowitz. So we were both going about 100mph down the highway going in and out of cars, and thn when I was coming up to exit 4 I saw some flashing lights. "blue" flashing lights. So I pulled over and Justin kinda just sneaked away. What he asked me:
  1. Where were you going in such a hurry?
    To the weathervane restuarant to eat with my parents.
  2. Was that your friend you were racing down the highway with to get to the weathervane?
    Yes
  3. So do you know how fast you were going?
    About 80 I guess
  4. Well see I clocked you at around 95
    Oh.... really, sorry about that
  5. Do you know that the speed limit is here?
    Yes
  6. Where abouts were you coming in such a hurry?
    Bedford, I was coming from and indoor soccer game

    The list goes on but eventually after he came back to my car and said that I have to go to court on Feb. 15th. Then he told me a short story, he was like when I was younger I used to speed, and do stupid things like that. But when your going 95 it can be really easy to lose control and if you do, your done for. I just kinda agreed and then eventually after about 20 minutes i got to the weathervane restuarant.

    My parents had already known that I had been pulled over cause they passed me about 5 minutes later. It was kinda funny cause when I finally got there they just made fun of me, lol.

    The moral of this story is try not to be Jeff Gordon, unless you have a nascar.

Yesterday at work, Morse decided to get Palmer back for parking his car in the Blockbuster lot. So as I am sure everyone knows it was about 10 outside. Therefore, Morse got Renzi to take 3 buckets of water outside and ice up Palmer's truck. When I went outside later that night, after we had closed, I looked at Palmer's truck and seriously it must have had about half an inch of ice all over it. I only wish I had gotten the chance to see Palmer's face.
Found out yesterday that I have pneumonia

I'm gonna be trendy like HCJ and list the past things that have happened since i last updated.
  1. got a pool table
  2. caddy d got injured
  3. kyler and tyle slept over and ate crumpets
  4. opened all my christmas stuff
  5. big blizzard
  6. played king of the mountain with part of the 24/7 crew
  7. went completely sideways in the boat for about 30 feet, at the kmart parking lot (a lot of fun)
  8. played snow football with part of the 24/7 crew
  9. got the week off work
  10. family from england flew into boston
Today.....

After about a 45 minute drive made it to the mountain. I went to Pats Peak w/ the whole England crew and went snowboarding. Became affiliated with the snowboard and now I'm a pro. (or so i think) After about an hour I found a jump and tried it a few times. Didn't land once, but i got some major air. Then we all went home after about 5 hours. Around 7 we went ot the Outback Steak House (and did not choke on any steak) and I had a burger. Came home once again and then just chilled for the rest of the night.
I have come to a conclusion, from lots of different aspects on the situation at hand, it is proven that Mike Hildreth was raped, lol.
